ticket_title: Missing Baggage Issue on Flight AL1013
ticket_summary: Arvind is reporting a missing baggage issue related to their flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024.
email_subject: Missing/Delayed Baggage – Flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024
email_body:
Dear Customer Service,

I am writing to report that my baggage has not arrived with my flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024. It is extremely concerning as I need my belongings for an important event.

Please let me know how quickly you can resolve this issue.

Thank you,
Arvind Vivekanandan
arvind.v@berkeley.edu
